reviews.text: We stopped at this place in the middle of a very long road trip. It seemed to have easy acess to the highway ( not as easy as we thought), and was the only hotel offering a decent rate in the area. Well, this became the worst hotel experience of my life. It was actually so bad that it was kinda comical though.
reviews.title: Worst hotel I have ever been to...

likes.disliked: — Smell, dripping ac, bugs, seedy area, and too many other things to mention.
